title: Roasted Potatoes, Carrots, and Onions
description: A simple and delicious roasted vegetable dish, perfect for a quick side or vegetarian meal.
steps: Wash and peel the potatoes and carrots. Cut them into bite-sized pieces.
Peel and slice the onion into wedges.
In a large bowl, combine the potatoes, carrots, and onions.
Drizzle with olive oil and toss to coat evenly.
Add salt, black pepper, garlic powder, and dried thyme. Toss again to combine.
Spread the vegetable mixture on a baking sheet in a single layer.
Roast in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and slightly caramelized, stirring halfway through.
Remove from the oven and let cool for a few minutes before serving.
